reviews.text: Stayed with my wife and 4 year old daughter for 1 night for a short family break
reviews.title: Could have been 5 out of 5

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a 3rd floor apartment in the Starfish block. The room was better than I expected. Spacious, clean and well equipped. The bathroom had a nice drench shower with body spray nozzles
reviews.title: Whitby week

reviews.text: The only downside was the bed which was an Ikea affair, a bit creaky and not very comfortable.
reviews.title: Shame, was expecting a luxury break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service at reception was very good and the breakfast very nice
reviews.title: Great second stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We paid £6 to park off road in a garage around the corner. Luckily we had read the reviews and took my wife's little car. The street is very tight and there is no way a large car would get in
reviews.title: Second time around......Still superb!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the third time that we have stayed at Discovery - cannot say enough about it - in my opinion, it is still the best place to stay in Whitby! Great rooms, great staff
reviews.title: Just Mint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wow! we'd, seen these apartments on late rooms.com and thought they looked too good to be true.
reviews.title: Discovery and Starfish apartments,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: How wrong we were, these fully furnished apartments have everything you could wish for.
reviews.title: Xmas stay

reviews.text: We stayed in an apartment called Waves, the view from the windows was fab, we looked over to the the abbey and the Harbour entrance.
reviews.title: definite value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there for a long weekend in Dec 2011, The apartment had large TV, dvd player, electric central heating, It was two bedroomed, with a double room and a twin bed room, everything was in pristine condition.
reviews.title: Short break with wife in December 2011

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent 2 nights in the Bay in January 2012 and I am pleased to say Discovery Accommodation is an excellant B & B. Ideal fo the cliff top and the town centre shops and restaurants in Whitby. It is situated in peaceful side street with well equipped rooms, comfortable beds and excellant of breakfasts. The owners and staff are extremely welcoming and cannot do enough to make your stay memorable. We will definately use the Discovery Accommodation again, when visiting Whitby.
reviews.title: Short stay in Whitby

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great 2 days in Whitby was which was made better by the staff at Discovery, which is in the perfect location, and which offers good cooked breakfasts, The comfortable apartment was warm and spacious with views over the Abbey. we got a friendly welcome, and plenty of local information from Amy..
reviews.title: winter break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Will go back again soon.
reviews.title: wonderful discovery
The upset and stress this company has cause us
reviews.text: Stayed in the room named Bay for 2 nights. It was just like living in your own flat - warm, spacey & comfortable. I found the walls were thin as I could hear next door guest's snoring. Just in the town centre but on a quiet street.
We have stayed here on several occasions before, & the rules of booking direct with this company are:-
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.text: I stayed at the Discovery Accommodation on business, it was booked at the last minute and as a woman travelling on her own I like to feel safe. however Discovery was great especially at under £50 per night. I was given a great little room with very smart shower room. The staff were very friendly and helpful and breakfast excellent. This B n B represents fantastic value for money and was a pleasant change from the chains where every room is identical. I'd definitley go back if I had to stay in the area again.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i booked Discovery Accommodation for my parents golden wedding, from the moment they arrived the staff made them feel very welcome.
reviews.title: Excellent golden wedding weekend

reviews.text: The room they had was lovely and clean and had everything they needed,the breakfast service was outstanding with a very good choice,cooked beautifully and well. will definately be returning.
reviews.title: Working trip

reviews.text: thanks xxx
reviews.title: Great location, great apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in the annexe with two work colleagues. the rooms are finished to a high standard and are warm and cosy....felt lie home from home. tv and tea making facilities were brilliant.
reviews.title: great winter break
